name: Magma Storm
description:
Magma Storm  is A Collaboration Between Jack Programs and Devman Diyør. Together we made this simple Survival game in 3 days. 

Gameplay

In the game, you can get your arrow keys to Shield the castle from falling meteors AKA magma. The point of the game is to get the highest score based on how long you survive. After a few seconds, the game starts to become harder. 

Updates

The game may be updated occasionally but no major updates are expected to come. The game can also be downloaded to be played offline with the download link below... 

How We Made It
